title: Sir Ian McGeechan's combined Wales-South Africa team: How many of Warren Gatland's men make the cut?
text:
As England prepare to face the task of overcoming the All Blacks in the weekend's first World Cup semi-final, Wales have a chance to reach their first ever final in the competition, giving long-time coach Warren Gatland a fantastic send-off.

The 2019 Six Nations champions and Grand Slam winners face South Africa as underdogs, with the Springboks second favourites for the cup.

Ahead of their crucial match, Sir Ian McGeechan takes us through his combined Wales and South Africa XV.

15 Willie le Roux
